item.title: Lululemon’s founder says yoga-wear giant has ‘completely lost its way’
item.description: Chip Wilson, who has been trying to reshape Lululemon’s board, said the company didn’t care about product development or quality.

item.title: Tesla’s stock pops on a robotaxi milestone. Here’s what comes next.
item.description: Tesla has started removing safety drivers from some robotaxi rides. CEO Elon Musk expects the company’s robotaxi network to be “very, very widespread”...

item.title: BitGo’s stock leaps out of the gate, as IPO investors are undeterred by bitcoin’s selloff
item.description: The first big IPO of the year receives a warm Wall Street welcome, though most of its early gains evaporate

item.title: AMD’s stock is on a hot streak not seen in six years
item.description: AMD’s stock is riding the broad excitement over central processing units for AI servers

item.title: Why the winter storm that’s about to hit could be especially treacherous for flying
item.description: The massive storm presents a logistics puzzle for airlines, in part because it will also affect airports in the South. Expect horror stories.
